abilities.name: Delicate Precision
abilities.description: If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by this model is 6, that attack inflicts a number of mortal wounds equal to the Damage characteristic of the weapon used for the attack and the attack sequence ends (do not make a save roll).

abilities.name: Ritual Knife
abilities.description: If this model is armed with a Ritual Knife, at the end of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy model within 1" of this model and roll a dice. On a 1, nothing happens. On a 2-5, that enemy model suffers 1 mortal wound. On a 6, that enemy model suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Dark Temptations
abilities.description: At the start of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy Hero within 3" of this model and ask your opponent if they wish that Hero to accept temptation. If they refuse, that Hero suffers D3 mortal wounds. If they accept, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by that Hero. Then, at the start of the next combat phase, roll a dice. On 1-3, that Hero no longer receives this modifier to their hit rolls. On 4-6, that Hero is slain.

abilities.name: Living Whip
abilities.description: If this model is armed with a Living Whip, at the start of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy Monster model within 6" of this model and roll a dice. On a 3+, pick 1 melee weapon that enemy Monster model is armed with. Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with that weapon until the end of that combat phase.

abilities.name: Shining Aegis
abilities.description: If this model is armed with a Shining Aegis, roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this model. On a 6+, that wound or mortal wound is negated.

abilities.name: Sinistrous Hand:
abilities.description: If this model is armed with a Sinistrous Hand, at the end of the combat phase, if any enemy models were slain by wounds inflicted by this model’s attacks in that combat phase, you can heal D3 wounds allocated to this model. If any enemy Heroes were slain by wounds inflicted by this model’s attacks in that combat phase, you can heal D6 wounds allocated to this model instead.

command_ability.name: Excess of Violence
command_ability.description: You can use this command ability in the combat phase, when it is your turn to pick a unit to fight with. If you do so, pick 1 friendly Hedonite unit that has already fought once in that combat phase and is wholly within 12" of a model with this command ability. That unit can be selected to fight for a second time if it is within 3" of any enemy units. You cannot pick the same unit to benefit from this command ability more than once in the same combat phase.

magic.name: Cacophonic Choir
magic.description: If successfully cast, roll 2D6. Each enemy unit within 6" of the caster that has a Bravery characteristic of less than the roll suffers D3 mortal wounds.

magic.name: Arcane Bolt
magic.description: Pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mw, if the casting roll is 10+, that unit suffers D3 mw's

magic.name: Mystic Shield
magic.description: Pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Reroll save rolls of 1 until your next hero phase

artefact.name: Ghyrstrike
artefact.description: +1 to hit, +1 to wound a melee weapon.

phases.name: Delicate Precision
phases.description: If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by this model is 6, that attack inflicts a number of mortal wounds equal to the Damage characteristic of the weapon used for the attack and the attack sequence ends (do not make a save roll).

On 1-3, that Hero no longer receives this modifier to their hit rolls. On 4-6, that Hero is slain.

If you do so, pick 1 friendly Hedonite unit that has already fought once in that combat phase and is wholly within 12" of a model with this command ability. That unit can be selected to fight for a second time if it is within 3" of any enemy units. You cannot pick the same unit to benefit from this command ability more than once in the same combat phase.

phases.name: Cacophonic Choir
phases.description: If successfully cast, roll 2D6. Each enemy unit within 6" of the caster that has a Bravery characteristic of less than the roll suffers D3 mortal wounds.

phases.name: Arcane Bolt
phases.description: Pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mw, if the casting roll is 10+, that unit suffers D3 mw's

phases.name: Mystic Shield
phases.description: Pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Reroll save rolls of 1 until your next hero phase

abilities.name: Deadly Grace
abilities.description: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Ravaging Claw is 6, that attack inflicts 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.

abilities.name: Discordant Disruption
abilities.description: Re-roll successful casting rolls for enemy Wizards that are within 24" of one or more models with this ability. In addition, if the re-rolled casting roll is a double, that Wizard suffers D3 mws after the effects of the spell (if any) have been carried out.

abilities.name: Harmonic Alignment
abilities.description: At the start of your hero phase, each friendly Infernal Rapturess that is part of a Slaanesh army and on the battlefield generates 1 Depravity point for her army.

phases.name: Discordant Disruption
phases.description: Re-roll successful casting rolls for enemy Wizards that are within 24" of any friendly models with this ability. In addition, if the re-rolled casting roll is a double, that Wizard suffers D3 mortal wounds after the effects of the spell (if any) have been carried out. In addition, this model can attempt to dispel 1 endless spell at the start of your hero phase, in the same manner as a Wizard. If it does so, add 1 to the dispelling roll.

phases.name: Harmonic Alignment
phases.description: At the start of your hero phase, each friendly Infernal Rapturess that is part of a Slaanesh army and on the battlefield generates 1 Depravity point for her army.

abilities.name: Alluress
abilities.description: Add 1 to the attacks characteristic of an Alluress's Piercing Claws

abilities.name: Standard Bearers
abilities.description: You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by a unit that includes any standard bearers.

abilities.name: Icon Bearers
abilities.description: If the unmodified roll for a battleshock test for a unit that includes any icon bearers is 1, you can add D6 models to that unit, and no models from that unit will flee in that battleshock phase.

abilities.name: Hornblower
abilities.description: If the unmodified roll for a battleshock test for an enemy unit that is within 6" of any friendly hornblowers is 1, that battleshock test must be re-rolled.

abilities.name: Sadisitic Killers
abilities.description: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with Piercing Claws is 6, that attack inflicts 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit. While this unit has 20 or more models, attacks inflicts 2 hits on an unmodified roll of 5 or 6, instead of only on a 6

abilities.name: Lithe and Swift
abilities.description: This unit can run and still charge later in the same turn.

abilities.name: Locus of Excruciation
abilities.description: Re-roll unmodified hit rolls of 6 for attacks made with melee weapons that target this unit while this unit is wholly within 9" of a friendly Daemon Slaanesh Hero

herald_on_exalted_seeker_chariot.name: Herald of Slaanesh on Exalted Seeker Chariot

abilities.name: Swirling Shapes and Unholy Hues
abilities.description: Your opponent must add 1 to the result of any battleshock tests made for units within 3" of any Chariot that charged that turn.

abilities.name: Exalted Excess of Blades
abilities.description: After this model makes a charge move, roll a dice for each enemy model within 1." On a roll of 4 or more, that model's unit suffers D3 mws.

abilities.name: Deadly Grace
abilities.description: Each time you make a hit roll of 6 or more for this model's Flensing Whips or Piercing Claws, it can immediately make one extra attack using the same weapon.

abilities.name: Disturbing Beauty
abilities.description: Your opponent must subtract 1 from all hit rolls made for Heroes when they target this model.

phases.name: Excess of Blades
phases.description: Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this model after this model finishes a charge move. On a 1, nothing happens. on a 2-4, that unit suffers D3 mws. On a 5+ that unit suffers D6 mws.

phases.name: Pungent Soulscent
phases.description: At the start of the combat phase; roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this model. On a 2+, that unit suffers D3 mws. In addition, for each 2+, add 1 to the attack characteristic of this model's melee weapons until the end of the phase.

phases.name: Acquiescence
phases.description: If successfully cast, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.

phases.name: Arcane Bolt
phases.description: Pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mw, if the casting roll is 10+, that unit suffers D3 mw's

phases.name: Mystic Shield
phases.description: Pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Reroll save rolls of 1 until your next hero phase

abilities.name: Blissbringer
abilities.description: Leader can re-roll wound rolls of 1 made with the Deadly Pincers in the combat phase

abilities.name: Crushing Grip
abilities.description: If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with Deadly Pincers is 6, that attack has a dmg of D3 instead of 1.

abilities.name: Deadly Venom
abilities.description: An attack made with a Barbed Stinger has dmg of 1 (1 wound enemy), D3 (2-3 wound enemy), or D6 (4+ wound enemy)

abilities.name: Disruptive Song
abilities.description: Subtract 1 from casting rolls for enemy Wizards while they are within 12" of one or more models with this ability.

abilities.name: Locus of Grace
abilities.description: You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by this unit while this unit is wholly within 12" of a friendly Daemon Slaanesh Hero.

abilities.name: Sporific Musk
abilities.description: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with melee weapons that target this unit. In addition while this unit has 4 or more models, subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks made with melee weapons that target this unit.

melee_weapons.name: Barbed Stinger
melee_weapons.damage: 1 (1 wound enemy), D3 (2-3 wound enemy), or D6 (4+ wound enemy)

phases.name: Banner Bearers
phases.description: You can re-roll charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Daemonette Banner Bearers.

phases.description: If an unmodified battleshock roll of 1 is made for this unit while it includes any Daemonette Icon Bearers, you can add D6 models to this unit, and no models from this unit will flee in that phase.

abilities.description: You can roll 2D6 instead of D6 when you make a run roll for this unit. In addition, this unit can run and still charge later in the same turn.
